item.title: A Practical Guide to Mixed Models in R
item.description: I created this guide so that students can learn about important statistical concepts while remaining firmly grounded in the programming required to use statistical tests on real data…

item.title: Creating a scientific manuscript in LaTeX
item.description: I also had to add captions and labels to my figures so I could refer to them in the text with their labels instead of their numbers…

item.title: My current research, for laypeople
item.description: I have struggled a lot to explain my current line of research to people in my life who aren’t scientists. But if I can’t explain my research to everyone, then I can’t claim to really know what I’m doing…

item.title: I'm going to Denmark! Here's why.
item.description: With my Master’s degree in hand, I’m happy to say that I will be starting a year-long fellowship with the European Doctoral School of Demography (EDSD) in September, at the Max Planck Center for Biodemography in…
